name: BUMBLING BUILDERS
description:
Defend your little friends from evil creatures seeking to destroy your kingdom! Build whatever defenses you can to ensure your king's survival, and maybe the others' as well? 

Credits:

  • Oroshibu - Team Lead, Programmer
  • EchoDuck - Programmer
  • GiM - Programmer
  • Naom - Artist
  • IbanPlay - Artist
  • Viktor Kraus - Music, Sound Design
  • Nomis - Promo art

BUMBLING BUILDERS was made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 49 with the theme "Unstable".
